Articles.Content:
So this was totally worth a post

Avid reddit user here and I just thought everyone should know that there are...3 KSP posts within the first 4 pages (currently) on REDDIT's front page.

That..IS...AWESOME!

EDIT: Fellow redditors will understand If not..go check out reddit (careful tho..)

So this was totally worth a post

Avid reddit user here and I just thought everyone should know that there are...3 KSP posts within the first 4 pages (currently) on REDDIT's front page.

That..IS...AWESOME!

EDIT: Fellow redditors will understand If not..go check out reddit (careful tho..)

I just did and KSP isn't on the front page at all today :S I'm guessing when you say the front page you mean the tab title front, which is a compiled list of the highest rated posts from the subreddits you subscribe to. You have to hit the all tab to get an accurate reading of whats the highest rated across all of reddit. However KSP is usually somewhere on the front page of the all tab as well recently.
